entries.name: new()
entries.desc: Creates a new Parser.  See also ::parse

entries.name: tokenize(str)
entries.desc: Returns a token stream for str, for testing

entries.name: build_list(margin)
entries.desc: Builds a List flush to margin

entries.name: build_paragraph(margin)
entries.desc: Builds a Paragraph that is flush to margin

entries.name: build_verbatim(margin)
entries.desc: Builds a Verbatim that is indented from margin.

entries.name: get()
entries.desc: Pulls the next token from the stream.

entries.name: parse(parent, indent = 0)
entries.desc: Parses the tokens into an array of RDoc::Markup::XXX objects, and appends them to the passed parent RDoc::Markup::YYY object.

entries.name: peek_token()
entries.desc: Returns the next token on the stream without modifying the stream

entries.name: skip(token_type, error = true)
entries.desc: Skips the next token if its type is token_type.

entries.name: tokenize(input)
entries.desc: Turns text input into a stream of tokens

entries.name: unget()
entries.desc: Returns the current token to the token stream
